plot: Vera Brittain's world falls to pieces around her as, one by one, the young men of her circle are caught up in the Great War.
plot_en: Vera Brittain's world falls to pieces around her as, one by one, the young men of her circle are caught up in the Great War.
plot_es: Vera Brittain's world falls to pieces around her as, one by one, the young men of her circle are caught up in the Great War.
title: Testament of Youth
